metadata.name: All About the Breaks
metadata.description:
This sample pack is designed for artists who want to step up their game. I've been crafting these samples designing crispy drums, catchy breaks and solid synth/bass loops. If you like distorted sounds, ominous atmospheres and heavy drum loops, this pack is for you.  
  
Samples included in this Kit:  
 - msft_bass_fill_dist_172_F#  
 - msft_bass_fill_rate_145_C#  
 - msft_bass_fill_crushed_132_Fmin  
 - msft_bass_fill_vibrato_ting_Db  
 - msft_bass_loop_deep_screech_172_C#  
 - msft_bass_loop_descending_174_Dmin

 - msft_bass_loop_bouncy_808_138_Abmin
